sentences.en: " Ashley,'she said. " Ashley and you -- " Her voice faltered into stillness.
sentences.cn: " 艾希礼, " 她说, " 艾希礼和你 ---- " 她的声音颤抖着,说不出来了.

sentences.en: As it is, I enjoy with something of sadness remembering that this melodious silence is but the prelude of that deeper stillness which waits to enfold us all.
sentences.cn: 实际上，我带着几分悲伤喜欢回忆起这种悦耳的沉默只是比较深层的寂静的前奏，它等待着要把我们所有的人笼罩起来。

sentences.en: But a stillness as of death hung over the plantation.
sentences.cn: 可是农场上笼罩着一片死一般的寂静.

sentences.en: From time to time his sharp cough broke the rather frightening stillness.
sentences.cn: 他偶尔发出一两声短促的咳嗽,打破这多少有点叫人害怕的静寂.

sentences.en: Her large shapely body seemed to relapse naturally into stillness.
sentences.cn: 她的体态动人的高大身子似乎自然而然地陷于静止了.

sentences.en: In the stillness of night could be heard the ringing of a distant bell.
sentences.cn: 更深人静的时候可以听到远处的钟声.

sentences.en: Melanie's voice gathered strength in the stillness of the room.
sentences.cn: 在一片沉寂之中,媚兰的声音慢慢坚定起来.

sentences.en: Paradox plowed into paradox , stillness mixed with stillness , sound with sound.
sentences.cn: 万寂交而万籁和, 若真若假,若是若非.

sentences.en: The dawns were heralded by the descent of a chill stillness.
sentences.cn: 自天而降的一阵寂寞冷落的清寒,引来了一天的黎明.

sentences.en: The placid waters stirred violently , and a loud noise broke the stillness.
sentences.cn: 平静的水面被扰乱了, 湖里起了大的响声,荡漾在静夜的空气中许久不散.

sentences.en: The sound of footsteps on the path broke the stillness.
sentences.cn: 小路上的脚步声打破了宁静。

sentences.en: The stillness and the silence of the large man unnerved him.
sentences.cn: 又高又壮的人这种镇定自若和一言不发使他气绥.

sentences.en: The stillness of night was broken by the boom of a cannon.
sentences.cn: 夜晚的寂静被隆隆的炮声打破。

sentences.en: The stillness was rent by thunderous applause.
sentences.cn: 雷鸣般掌声打破了寂静.

sentences.en: There was a sudden stillness in the air.
There was an audible stillness, in which the common voice sounded strange.
sentences.cn: 车间变得异样的寂静,简直可以用耳朵听到这寂静, 而人的声音听上去反而怪怪的.

sentences.en: This is your true nature, one of effortless peace and stillness.
sentences.cn: 这就是你的本质，一个完全不需费力的平静和静止。

words.tran_cn: 静止的，不动的；寂静的，平静的；不起泡的
蒸馏；使…静止；使…平静下来

trans.tran_cn: 静止，不动，沉静，镇定自若
trans.tran_en: the quality of being quiet and not moving
